text: @realDonaldTrump I live in the State of Illinois not the State of Chicago. Dont bail Pritzker out! Make him file bankruptcy so the Feds can come in & restructure this mess. Trust me, it ain't the virus, it's the corruption. Illinois was broken long before covid-19
